subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[徑]]}} ''(Orthodox {{w|Traditional Chinese|traditional form}} of ''<big>逕</big>'' in mainland China)''
* <font size=4, lang=zh-Hans>[[径#Translingual|径]]</font> ''({{w|Simplified Chinese|Simplified}} form of ''<big>逕</big>'' and {{l|mul|徑}} in mainland China)''
* {{l|mul|[[迳]]}} ''({{w|Simplified Chinese|Simplified}} form of ''<big>逕</big>'' only used for placenames and personal names in mainland China)''

# {{lb|zh|literary|of water}} to [[flow]] through

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|一逕|井逕|大有逕庭|大相逕庭|畦逕|逕入|逕到|逕取|逕庭|逕啟者|逕流|逕自|逕行|逕路兒}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text:
* In mainland China, this character, <big>逕</big> is considered a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant}} traditional form of {{l|zh|徑}}. The usage of <big>逕</big> is replaced by the orthodox form {{l|zh|徑}} which is simplified as {{l|zh|径}}.
* In the {{w|Song dynasty}} dictionary, {{w|Jiyun}} 《{{w2|zh|集韻}}》, <big>逕</big> is also listed as a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant form}} of {{l|zh|徑}}. However, in modern Taiwan, <big>逕</big> and {{l|zh|徑}} are considered as two different characters. <!-- Refer http://dict.variants.moe.edu.tw/variants/rbt/word_attribute.rbt?quote_code=QTAxMjg5LTAwNA -->
